data.name: Aussie Battler Tanks
data.detailed_description:
AUSSIE BATTLER TANKS MULTIPLAYER
10 WW2 TANKS, 2 TO 12 PLAYERS WITH HASSLE FREE MULTIPLAYER HOSTING ON CLOUD NETWORK FOR AUSTRALIANS ONLY, 3 GAME MODES TDM CTF CP AND 7 MAPS.
PHYSICS TRACKS AND HIT POINTS DAMAGE SYSTEM WITH AP AND HE SHELLS, AND EACH TANK HAS ITS INDERVIUAL ADVANTAGES.
FILE SIZE ON DISK AFTER INSTALL IS 5GB.
WINNERS ARE GRINNERS COPY AND SHARE WITH FREINDS.

READ ME INFO:
LOWEST PC SPECS - CPU = QUAD CORE 2.6 GHZ, RAM MEMORY = 8 GB,
LOWEST ONBOARD VIDEO = "intel(r) hd graphics 630", WITH AT LEAST 3GHZ QUADCORE CPU.
RECOMEND VIDEO CARDS "AMD R9 390" "AMD RX 580" OR "NVIDIA GTX 970" WITH 4GB OR BETTER.

3 GAME MODES = TDM-TEAM DEATH MATCH, CTF-CAPTURE THE FLAG, CP-CONTROL POINTS DOMINATION.
7 MAPS.
10 WW2 TANKS.
2 TO 12 PLAYERS.

EASY PHOTON CLOUD PLAYER ROUND HOSTING WITH OPTIONS LIKE PASSWORD, FREINDS, PING LIMIT, MUCH MORE.

MENU = ESC.
PLAYER SCORE = TAB.

DRIVE MOVEMENT = ARROW KEYS.
TURRET MOVEMENT = MOUSE
ZOOOM IN OUT = MOUSE WHEEL.
AIM = RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON.
SWAP SHELL TYPE ARMOUR PIERCE OR HIGH EXPLOSIVE = V
VOTE = F1 YES F2 NO.

data.short_description: Multiplayer ww2 tanks game, not pay to win. 10 ww2 tanks, 2 to 12 players with hassle free multiplayer hosting on cloud network for Australians only due to expenses, 3 game modes and 7 maps. Physics tracks and hit point damage system with AP and HE shells.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 ghz quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ONBOARD "intel(r) hd graphics 630" WITH 3GHZ CPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most or onboard
  • Additional Notes: Not tested on win7 or win8
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 ghz quad core
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: "AMD R9 390" "AMD RX 580" "NVIDIA GTX 970"
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most or onboard
  • Additional Notes: Frame rate capped at 60fps

data.legal_notice:
This game is for Australian residents only and must be over 13 years of age.
Mods are not supported.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains tank warfare of tanks shooting each other with explosions.
